text:
To ingest any chunk into Cloudflare Vectorize via your Worker:

Use this single-line command in Windows CMD:

curl -X POST "https://app.joffad.workers.dev/api/ingest" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"id\":\"<CHUNK-ID>\",\"text\":\"<ESCAPED-TEXT>\",\"metadata\":{\"source\":\"master-cv\",\"section\":\"<SECTION>\"}}"

Notes:
- Escape all quotes inside text with \"
- Replace line breaks with \n
- For long chunks, place JSON into a file and use --data-binary "@file.json"

Example using file-based ingestion:

curl -X POST "https://app.joffad.workers.dev/api/ingest" -H "Content-Type: application/json" --data-binary "@mastercv-001.json"
